name: dbf-reader
description: A Node.js/Typescript module to read tabular data from the dBase DB (.dbf) file.

scripts.testWithCoverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register tests/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
